alert.note: Alert for Central Tangipahoa; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 25 at 4:55PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern St. Helena and northern Tangipahoa Parishes through 530 PM CDT... At 455 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Roseland, or near Amite, moving southwest at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Amite, Amite City, Kentwood, Roseland, Montpelier, Wilmer and Tangipahoa. This includes Interstate 55 in Louisiana between mile markers 42 and 60. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Tangipahoa; Northern Tangipahoa; St. Helena
